articles.author: Ann Murphy
articles.title: 35 new jobs announced for Cork as US firm opens European headquarters - EchoLive.ie
articles.content:
THIRTY-FIVE new jobs will be created in Cork with the opening of a new headquarters for a US firm.
Cork will be the headquarters for Europe, the Middle East and Africa for US company Tigera, a firm … [+1427 chars]

articles.title: Buhari lauds EU for support to Nigeria - Guardian
articles.description: President Muhammadu Buhari has lauded the European Union (EU) for being of help to Nigeria in diverse ways, including humanitarian and trade relations.
articles.content:
President Muhammadu Buhari has lauded the European Union (EU) for being of help to Nigeria in diverse ways, including humanitarian and trade relations.
